edu.dhbw.t10.type.keyboard
Class KeyboardLayout

java.lang.Object
  edu.dhbw.t10.type.keyboard.KeyboardLayout

public class KeyboardLayout
extends java.lang.Object

Representation of the keyboard layout with sizes and scale, as well as with all components (Buttons and Drop-Down-Lists)

Author:
NicolaiO
